sentences.en: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.cn: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.cn: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

sentences.en: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.cn: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.en: I have some news for you.
sentences.cn: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.en: I thought you might like to read the enclosed.
sentences.cn: 我想你或许想要读一下信封里的内容。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: If you love life, life will love you back.
sentences.cn: 热爱生活，生活也会厚爱你。

sentences.en: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older.
sentences.cn: 如果你等待，发生的只有变老。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.cn: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: Some battles you win, some battles you lose.
sentences.cn: 胜败乃兵家常事。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.cn: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.en: the minister was later to be sacked by you-know-who.
sentences.cn: 部长后来被那个人解雇了，你知道他是谁。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.cn: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: You idiot!
sentences.cn: 你这个白痴！

sentences.en: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.cn: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

phrases.tran_cn: ◎【军事】[用作操练口令]原地不动，还原，复原(指恢复原来的姿势)
你和你的一切（包括你的家人和密友）
那个人（或东西）（指不待明言便知所指是谁或什么东西）

trans.tran_cn: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

trans.tran_en: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them
